Method Detail

addShopFloor

public void addShopFloor(java.awt.Dimension size,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> aisles,
                         java.awt.Dimension checkoutArea,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> checkouts,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> customers)
adds a shop floor area, calls methods to add all other elements.

Parameters:
size - the size of the shop floor
aisles - the location of impassable aisles on the shop floor
checkoutArea - the size of the checkout area
checkouts - contains the customers in the queues
